history.content: Campus systems send out a confusing error message if a student can't enroll in a class for any reason (like CS70 is full) that appears to claim it is because of time conflicts.  This is just not true for departments that enable time conflicts which we do for both CS and EE (and EECS) classes.

children.subject: The class is full. The only way to get enrolled is if students currently enrolled drop and make room for currently waitlisted students or if the instructor agrees to/asks to expand the class.

@Michael,

However, it seems like the system attempted to enroll me but something was in the way otherwise this email wouldn't have been sent. I'm going to guess the reason is because I've declared a Non-EECS/CS major and must wait until the adjustment period to get enrolled.

Keto, that is not necessarily true. Like Michael-David said, campus system is not always correct. 

It says that you couldn’t get in because of a time conflict, but the real reason is because the class is full. 

If I were to try to reverse engineering what’s responsible for this, it’s probably something along the lines of:

if (failed_to_enroll):
   if (time conflict):
       send_time_conflict_email()
       return
   if (class_is_full):
       send_cls_full_email()
       return


Now what Michael-David is saying is that the reason you failed to enroll is NOT because of time conflicts, because the EECS department has disabled the ability to fail to enroll because of time conflicts. AFAIK, this is a new feature. 

So, you fail to enroll because the class is full, but because of some internal reasons (one possibility is my pseudocode above), you get a nonsensical error message.

@Michael-David Sasson

Do you recommend any follow-up instructions to get me enrolled?

history.content:
Hi, I've been on the waitlist for CS 70 since phase 1. I've just got an email saying that the system attempted to enroll me however due to time conflict they weren't able to (the email is attached below) due to time conflict. From what I've read, EECS does not prevent enrollment to CS70 due to time conflict.

=======================================================

You have NOT been enrolled from the wait list into the following class:

Term: 2018 Fall

Class: COMPSCI    70 

Section: 001

Reason: Time conflict with another section.

As neither class allows time conflict enrollments, you will remain on the waitlist unless or until you resolve the time conflict.
history.subject: CS 70 Time Conflict Email
